title: Dependency Diagnostic
description: What you get: dependency map, contract exposure snapshot, and continuity baselines. Typical timeline: 2-3 weeks. Decision enabled: where dependency is truly risky versus merely inconvenient.

title: Capability Pilot
description: What you get: one ringfenced capability run in parallel with reconciliations and rollback criteria. Typical timeline: 4-8 weeks. Decision enabled: approve cutover, extend the pilot, or stop safely.

title: Controlled Cutover Program
description: What you get: sequenced capability cutovers, executive control narratives, and governance routines that reduce dependency quarter by quarter. Typical timeline: roadmap-led. Decision enabled: scale with clarity, not momentum.
